code: import{getTheme,mergeStyles}from'@fluentui/react';var palette=getTheme().palette;export var headerStyles={root:{width:'100%'}};export var containerStyles={root:{height:'100%',minHeight:'9.375rem',width:'100%'}};export var paneStyles={root:{width:'17.875rem'}};export var hiddenContainerClassName={root:{border:"solid 1px ".concat(palette.neutralLighterAlt),height:'100%',display:'none'}};export var activeContainerClassName={root:{border:"solid 1px ".concat(palette.neutralLighterAlt),height:'calc(100% - 3px)',display:'initial'}};export var loadingStyle=mergeStyles({height:'100%',display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'});
